## [Right to Terminate for Potential Reputational Damage]{.underline}. Any Party may terminate this Agreement at any time without liability if association with the other Party could, in such Party's reasonable opinion, materially damage the reputation or image of such Party or Party's affiliates or in the event any Party breaches `r ref("#miscellaneous:confidentiality")` (Confidentiality). {#termination-available-remedies:potential-reputational-damage}
